explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of a radial basis function neural network (RBFNN) as part of the proposed model.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper compares the proposed hybrid model with BPNN (Backpropagation Neural Network), indicating relevance to backpropagation.
explanations.BP: BP is short for Backpropagation, which is mentioned in the context of BPNN (Backpropagation Neural Network) comparison.
